ygData.subject: DeathScythe arrives.
ygData.msgSnippet: How about this for a character entrance? ... And you were sent here to eliminate us? DeathScythe turns his head to look at the Maximal captain, his eyes

Subject: DeathScythe arrives.
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: Yanshosh@...

How about this for a character entrance?

::DeathScythe::

"And you were sent here to eliminate us?"

DeathScythe turns his head to look at the Maximal captain, his eyes never 
leaving the other two Maximals in the room.

"Yes," he says quietly, his voice sounding like death, "I am offering you a 
chance to live. Simply give me what I want."

The Maximal captain shakes his head. "Us Maximals don't give in to that. I 
suggest you retreat. You're outnumbered three to one."

"Then you die," DeathScythe says, his voice no more than a whisper.

Several seconds pass, feeling like hours to the four bots.

Without warning, DeathScythe jumps forward, his fist slamming into the head 
of one of the Maximals, knocking him unconscious. The other two jump at him, 
DeathScythe ducking, the other two slamming into each other. With an upward 
punch, he sends the Maximals flying into opposite sides of the room.

The captain stands up, the other Maximal obvioustly knocked unconscious. 
DeathScythe grins.

"So... The heroic Maximals try a three on one battle. How pathetic!" 
DeathScythe's grin broadens, the assassin reaching behind him. The Maximal 
commander jumps forward, swinging a fist at DeathScythe.

DeathScythe sidesteps, the hand behind his back producing a dagger, which he 
stabs downward into the Maximal's neck. The captain's eyes widen, his body 
flying into a comp console, the console exploding.

The ship that they were all in goes into a spin, dipping down toward a blue 
planet. DeathScythe is thrown against the wall, going unconscious.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The impact as the ship hits down in Africa is tremendous. The systems of the 
ship blink out, the DNA replicator the only one left online, but barely.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathScythe opens his eyes.

"I see you're awake."

The assassin looks over at the source of the voice, his eyes widening. The 
bot standing in front of him was the Maximal captain, holding his own head in 
his arms.

"I've been waiting for you to wake up," says the captain's head.

"W-w-w-w-w-w," DeathScythe mumbles, trying to form words, "W-what happened to 
your head?"

"My head?" the head frowns, then suddenly opens its mouth, "Oh! My head! Oh, 
you knocked it off in that fight."

DeathScythe shakes his head. "No I didn't, I stabbed you in the neck with a 
dagger."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes."

The head frowns, "Oh, you must be right."

The captain lifts his head to his shoulders, the wound healing. He then takes 
out a dagger and stabs it into his own neck. "That better?"

Eyes widened in astonishment, DeathScythe nods.

"Good. Follow me."

Silently, DeathScythe stands up, walking after the Maximal captain. The 
hallway they were walking down looked strange, circular, and dripping with 
something.

"Where are we?"

"In me."

"What??" DeathScythe stops, looking at the Maximal.

"In me," the captain says patiently, "I think we're in my abdomen."

"No we're not. You're right there. I can't be inside you."

"Sure you can, just shut up and follow."

DeathScythe growls. This Maximal was pissing him off. The assassin swings his 
fist at the Maximals's head.

The fist passes through the head, the Maximal turning around.

"That was rude," he says simply.

DeathScythe blinks. He had been expecting the Maximal to get hit and fall 
unconscious. "What was?"

"Pointing that spoon at me."

"What spoon?"

"The one in your left hand."

DeathScythe looks down at his left hand, surprised to see a small silver 
spoon in it.

"Um........" he says, continuing to follow the Maximal. He was now completely 
confused, "Are you sure we're inside you?"

The Maximal turns around with an annoyed look on his face, "Look, this is my 
dream, and whatever I say goes!"

DeathScythe's mouth opens, trying to say something, but to confused to decide 
what to say. "Your dream?!" he finally blurts out, "If this is a dream, it's 
my dream!"

DeathScythe lifts his left hand, about to throw the spoon at the Maximal, 
when he discoveres the spoon missing.

"YOU STOLE IT!" he yells at the Maximal.

The Maximal captain turns around, "Stole what?"

"The spoon I had in my hand!" yells an enraged DeathScythe.

"You didn't," the captain says calmly.

DeathScythe blinks. "Didn't what?"

"Have a spoon in your hand."

"I did?"

"No."

"Oh," DeathStorm says, blinking a few times to get his thoughts in order, but 
to no avail. DeathStorm finally cracks, losing his temper, he lets out an 
insane yell. "ENOUGH!!!" DeathScythe yells, reaching for his gun.

He blinks as he looks down at what he though was the gun, suddenly realizing 
that it was a bot's arm.

"Wha-who-who-wh-what is this?" he asks, his eyes wide.

"It's an arm."

"I KNOW IT'S AN ARM, YOU DIMWIT," DeathScythe yells on the top of his, "BUT 
WHOSE SLAGGIN' ARM IS THIS?!!!!"

"Mine," the Maximal says calmly, turning around, "Can I have it back?"

DeathScythe looks at the Maximal in disbelief. His eyes go to the Maximal's 
stump of an arm, where seconds before there appeared to be a fully functional 
limb. Looking back up to the captain's face, DeathScythe notices that the 
knife in the Maximal's shoulder has turned into a small silver spoon.

"YOU SLAG! YOU TOOK IT!!!!!" he screams, jumping at the Maximal and swinging 
the arm. "DIE! DIE! DIE! DIE!" he keeps yelling, whacking the Maximal with 
the bot's own arm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Replication complete."

DeathScythe opens his eyes. He was on his back, laying on cold ground. Above 
him was the night sky. DeathScythe turns his head, looking at a metal plate 
of the ship.

"AHHH!!" he jumps up, ready for battle against the hellish spawn he saw in 
the reflection. He blinks, realizing that the hellish spawn was himself.

DeathScythe smiles, admiring his new beast mode in the mirror. Either the 
ship was hit pretty bad, or this was one psycho planet. DeathScythe looked 
like all the animals on earth put together. His hind legs were that of a 
wolf, only much larger, so they could work together with his front legs, 
looking almost like a gurrila's hands, but ending in two mismatched hooves. 
His tail was a snake's tail, ending with a scorpion stinger.

DeathSythe back was covered by both fur, hide, and scales, different patches 
of covering for different spots. Out of the middle of his back stuck out two 
wings, in strange angles. From the angles of the wings, it was obvious that 
they were useless in flight, just there for apearence. In between the wings, 
a shark fin sticks out, leaning slightly to the left. His underbelly was 
covered with scales, fur sticking through them. Out of his sides stuck 
various fish fins, creating something like side teeth for the assassin.

His snout was hideous. From the middle of what looked like a T-rex's face, a 
rhino horn stuck out. Where the snout would be there was a bump, a seemingly 
human nose emerging from it. Under that was another bump, the mouth gaping 
its horrid collection of teeth, taken from various species on the planet.

"DeathScythe, ASSASSINATE!!!!"

DeathScythe transforms into robot mode, looking again at the plate. He was 
almost as hideous as he was in beast mode. His wolf hind-legs served as his 
feet, an extra pair of arms coming out to serve as his robot arms, leaving 
two hooves sticking out behind his back. Out of his shoulder stuck several 
fish fins, the other one carrying the shark fin. His whole body was random 
patches of different skins, hides, fur, and scales. Out of his back stuck his 
beast mode head, grinning its collection of teeth. His wings were folded over 
his back, providing a cape to hide his second head, making it look like a 
hump on his back. His robot head remained unchanged, still the evil mercyless 
face of an assassin.

DeathScythe smiles. He looked horrid. He looked like a freak. He could pass 
as something from the pit itself! He rather liked it.

DeathScythe looks at the other bots near the ship, all of them dead. He grins 
evilly as he looks at the captain. "Thought you could confuse me, eh?"

He walks over to the captain, kicking him before turning to disapear into the 
woods.
